[{'company': {'id': 667398, 'name': 'Encon', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQEc4xzNE4_NYA/company-logo_400_400/0/1684764116736?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=GSYzI7222HA2T00sJb3w-am9bUzXocSFeDb7Pe3fUjg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/enconduurzametransitie/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Encon', 'description': None, 'title': 'Project Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Lignina Serviços', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Lignina Serviços', 'description': 'Main Projects 
• ESG Due Diligence based on IFC PS of Wind Farms located in the state of CE, Brazil
• ESG Due Diligence based on IFC PS of Photovoltaic Complex located in the state of CE, Brazil
• Management to delivery all permits and environmental assessments required to progress and execution of a Solar Complex in the state of PB, Brazil
• Management during implementation of Transmission Line located in the state of TO and BA, Brazil

Responsibilities
• Delivery projects and completing tasks within project scope, budget and schedule requirements
• Define detail project scope, goals and deliverables based on the commercial information
• Monitor project deliverables and progress through continuous communication with project members, customers, government institutions and others stakeholders related to the project
• Execute ESG Due Diligence
• Provide project results in line with international standards, local regulations and best international practices
• Coordinate and manage projects processes with stakeholders
• Develop project for clients in the field of Sustainability and Natural Resources
• Write project proposals, methodologies and business cases 
• Project management for environmental permit applications and support studies
• Lead and execute detail Environmental Impact Assessments (ESIA) 
• Support technical studies including soil, water, air emissions and noise assessments and ecology survey', 'title': 'Project Manager / Environmental and Sustainability Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 9329019, 'name': 'Ambientare - Soluções em Meio Ambiente', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQHvT_4YBecMtA/company-logo_400_400/0/1688490543711?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=02ENCqQJ8gOHLP1HfiA83Lv58U-8WjUI8l6bpjChgNE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ambientare/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Ambientare - Soluções em Meio Ambiente', 'description': "Ambientare is specialized in providing services in the environmental area, focusing on environmental licensing and management of the project’s implementations. 

Main Projects 
• ESG Due Diligence based on IFC PS of Wind Farms located in the state of PI and PE, Brazil
• Transmission Line Vila do Conde–ToméAçu 230kV, Substation 230/138kV ToméAçu and Sectioning, PA-Brazil
• Transmission Line 500kV Tucuruí–Marituba, PA-Brazil 

Key-achievement
• Worked on more than 15 projects (small, medium and large scale) including execution and coordination of due diligence, risk analysis and Environmental and Social Impact Assessment
• Coordinated and lead team's with more than 10 direct employees
• Lead and delivered key projects that are considered priority and public utility by the Federal Institutions of Brazil

Responsibilities
• Monitor project deliverables and lead projects in a multi stakeholder environment throughout a complete project life cycle, supporting multinational clients to makes the best value decisions
• Be in charge of all project controls: e.g., planning, cost control, project administration and contract management
• Promote environmental compliance through construction and facility operations, including training, auditing, and maintaining permit compliance
• Assess and propose sustainability initiatives by considering cost-effectiveness, technical feasibility and acceptance
• Manage Environmental and Social Impact Assessment (ESIA) and Due Diligences, in multidisciplinary teams, providing guidance on strategy and approach
• Provide client focused project results in line with international standards (such as IFC PS and WB - ESF), local regulations and best international practices to ensure accurate identification, assessment, management and monitoring of environmental risks, impacts and opportunities", 'title': 'Project Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 24776280, 'name': 'MRS ESTUDOS AMBIENTAIS', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGzecQfX3Xu9Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1569336034432?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=-GLlnMEV01FPjxXLOM-1kvJCHI1ewV1LmRntxaGSAuo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mrs-estudos-ambientais/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Brasília e Região, Brasil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'MRS Ambiental', 'description': 'MRS Ambiental is company focus in develop solutions for all stages of your project with focus on the Environmental aspect, be it for small, medium and large enterprises of the most diverse types of business.

Main Projects
• Environmental management of the Port of Pecém, CE- Brazil
• Jacitara and Serra da Lua Thermoelectric Complex, RR – Brazil
• Audit of the Environmental Management System of the Liquefied Natural Gas Regasification Terminal, Port of Açu, RJ - Brazil
• Cellulose terminal and their harbor cradle in Port of Itaqui, MA – Brazil
• Dredging works at the Port São Luis, MA - Brazil
• Impact Assessment on Indigenous Land for Licensing of Transmission Line. Rio Branco - Cruzeiro do Sul, AC - Brazil

Key-achievement
• Participation and management in over 100 projects related to ESG and sustainability.
• Execution of more than 50 Environmental Social Impact Assessment – ESIA/EIA

Responsibilities
• Delivery projects and completing tasks within project scope, budget and schedule requirements
• Define detail project scope, goals and deliverables based on the commercial information
• Promote environmental compliance through construction and facility operations, including training, auditing, and maintaining permit compliance
• Provide project results in line with international standards, local regulations and best international practices
• Gather ESG data across functions, consolidate and manage all the insights with respect to it impact 
• Monitor project deliverables and progress through continuous communication with project members, customers, environmental agencies and institutions related to the project
• Project management for environmental permit applications and support studies
• Lead and execute detail Environmental Impact Assessments (ESIA) 
• Support technical studies including noise assessments, air emissions modeling and ecology survey
• Participate in ESG Due Diligence', 'title': 'Project Management Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'MRS Ambiental', 'description': 'Main Projects
•	Expansion of the Port of Itaqui, MA - Brazil
•	Implementation of the Casa Nova II and III Wind Farms, PI - Brazil
•	Environmental Management to maintain the operating license for the Agua Vermelha and Caconde hydroelectric plants, MG e SP - Brazil
•	Environmental Highway Regularization/Duplication Project of BR 364/060, MT e GO - Brazil

Key-achievement
•	Development of a methodology for environmental fragility assessment to help in the evaluation of the impact on areas surrounding an artificial reservoir and the environmental zoning

Responsibilities
•	Monitor project deliverables and progress through continuous communication with project members
•	Analyze and report environmental performance to internal and external clients and regulatory bodies
•	Monitored program/project/system status, budgets and timetables
•	Negotiate environmental service agreements and manage associated costs and revenues
•	Conduct literature reviews, gather and analyze data from primary and secondary sources
•	Attend project meetings and other as necessary
•	Administrative tasks relate to the project including organization of project meetings, time tracking and reporting
•	Execute Environmental and Social Impact Assessment (ESIA/EIA) in multidisciplinary teams
•	Support technical studies including noise assessments, air emissions modeling and ecology surveying required
•	Sustainability & ESG reporting, data acquisition, data management, analysis, and reporting.', 'title': 'Project Analyst/ Environmental Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'MRS Ambiental', 'description': 'Main Projects
• Environmental regularization and highway duplication of BR 153/262, MG - Brazil
• Impact Assessment on Indigenous Land for Licensing of Hydroelectric Castanheiras, MT - Brazil
• Environmental Impact Study - EIA for Environmental Licensing of Implementation, Paving and Special Arts Works on the Highway BR-393, ES - Brazil 
• Forest Inventory for the implementation of Light Vehicle on Rails, RJ - Brazil

Key-achievement
• Implementation of a botanical data review methodology that reduces conference time by 80%

Responsibilities
• Prepare technical documents related to environmental permitting, sustainability, soil, groundwater, flora, general environmental and health & safety topics in different projects (roads, wind farms, ports, transmission lines, substations, hydroelectric plants and industrial installations)
• Supported technical studies including noise assessments, air emissions modeling and ecology surveying
• Conduct literature reviews, gather and analyze data from primary and secondary sources
• Attend project meetings and other as necessary
• Provide useful information and analysis for decision-maker
• Undertake administrative tasks related to the project including organization of project meetings, time tracking and reporting
• Preparing internal and external project reporting', 'title': 'Project Analyst/ Environmental Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 26999636, 'name': 'ECOFLOR - Empresa Júnior Florestal Planalto Verde', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHwQ11xYQD9Gg/company-logo_400_400/0/1612051771174?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=0TUxyiQfyMqaI2Auk_PkMe4f4kYrWK9oN0ZQK_aaPbw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ecoflor-empresa-j%C3%BAnior-florestal-planalto-verde/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'ECOFLOR ', 'description': 'ECOFLOR is an educational and non-profit organization. Responsibilities
• Develop project proposals for clients in the field of Environment and Natural Resources
• Monitore the development of internal processes

• Define responsibilities and processes for business team and data management
• Assess  skills gaps for employees and developed training courses to meet identified needs', 'title': 'Research And Development Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 304811, 'name': 'Instituto Brasileiro do Meio Ambiente e dos Recursos Naturais Renováveis - IBAMA', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFoNBJrAH8UdA/company-logo_400_400/0/1650400961913?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Urp8LNkpnkClH771rY0iFC4VYcMKcjdVrGgTIOzuc5Y', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ibama/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Instituto Brasileiro do Meio Ambiente e dos Recursos Naturais Renováveis - Ibama', 'description': 'The Brazilian Institute for the Environment and Renewable Natural Resources (IBAMA), is a federal agency linked to the Ministry of the Environment (MMA). It is the executive agency responsible for implementing the National Environmental Policy, and develops various activities for the preservation and conservation of natural heritage, exercising control and supervision over the use of natural resources (water, flora, fauna, soil). It is also responsible for granting environmental licenses for projects within its competence.

Responsibilities
• Participate in researching sustainability and ESG regulations, creating content and reports
• Georeference processes and undertaken administrative tasks related to them including time tracking and reporting
• Monitore progress of processes
• Conduct literature reviews, gather and analyze data from different sources
• Assist on analysis of environmental projects and preparation of technical information', 'title': 'Environmental Specialist', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1235845, 'name': 'CAESB - Companhia de Saneamento Ambiental do Distrito Federal', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHEmfQELBBrZA/company-logo_400_400/0/1674249292338?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=NeXU6M0s74zojUt8fzM3QIEtd8RTeaMli_HGfVQqIn0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/caesb-companhia-de-saneamento-ambiental-do-distrito-federal/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'CAESB - Companhia de Saneamento Ambiental do Distrito Federal', 'description': "The Environmental Sanitation Company of the Federal District (Caesb) is the Brazilian sanitation company in the Federal District. It operates in all administrative regions of the Federal District and in some surrounding municipalities. Its organization follows the concepts of a state enterprise in the category of Mixed Economy Society. It has a monopoly over the use and commercialization of water resources in the Federal District region.

Responsibilities
• Support being responsible for leading, coordinating and delivering internal communications initiatives, and creating relevant communications content (e.g. written communication, scripts, presentations) 
• Support and participated on the preparation of environmental education material for use in events related to environmental mobilization and statistical assessment of the activities performed.
